function.name: spellcheck_for_web_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "web_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Check spelling."

text.description: The text string to check for spelling errors.

function.name: newssearch_for_web_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "web_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get news articles relevant for a given query."

pagesize.description: The number of items per page. The maximum value is 50.

topublisheddate.description: The  published date and time for the newest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

safesearch.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

frompublisheddate.description: The  published date and time for the oldest article allowed.  For example: *2015-05-16T05:50:06.* See  [https://www.c-sharpcorner.com/blogs/date-and-time-format-in-c-sharp-programming1 ](url)for more possible DateTime formats.

function.name: imagesearch_for_web_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "web_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get relevant images for a given query."

pagesize.description: The number of items per page. The maximum value is 50.

safesearch.description: A filter used to filter results for adult content.

function.name: product_reviews_for_real_time_product_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "real_time_product_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get all product reviews. Infinite pagination/scrolling is supported using the *limit* and *offset* parameters."

product_id.description: Product id of the product for which to fetch reviews.

country.description:
Country code of the region/country.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

language.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

offset.description:
Number of reviews to skip.
Valid values: integers from 0-30000
Default: `0`.

rating.description:
Only return reviews with user rating greater than the specified value.
Valid values: 1-5.

limit.description:
Maximum number of product reviews to return.
Valid values: integers from 0-100.
Default: `10`.

function.name: product_offers_for_real_time_product_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "real_time_product_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "Get all offers available for a product."

product_id.description: Product id of the product for which to fetch offers.

country.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

language.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

function.name: search_for_real_time_product_search
function.description: This is the subfunction for tool "real_time_product_search", you can use this tool.The description of this function is: "search_for_real_time_product_search for product offers - both free-form queries and GTIN/EAN are supported. Each page contains up to 30 product offers. Infinite pagination/scrolling is supported using the *page* parameter."

q.description: Free-form search query or a GTIN/EAN (e.g. *0194252014233*).

store_id.description:
Only return product offers from a specific store. Store IDs can be obtained from the Google Shopping URL after using the **Seller** filter by taking the first part of the `merchagg` variable (until the first *|*) within the `tbs` parameter.

**Example**
af

sort_by.description:
Sort product offers by best match, top rated, lowest or highest price.
Possible values: `BEST_MATCH`, `TOP_RATED`, `LOWEST_PRICE`, `HIGHEST_PRICE`.
Default: `BEST_MATCH`.

max_shipping_days.description: Only return product offers that offer shipping/delivery of up to specific number of days (i.e. shipping speed).

on_sale.description:
Only return product offers that are currently on sale.
Default: `false`.

product_condition.description:
Only return products with a specific condition.
Possible values: `NEW`, `USED`, `REFURBISHED`.

free_shipping.description:
Only return product offers that offer free shipping/delivery.
Default: `false`.

language.description:
The language of the results.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_639-1_codes
Default: `en`.

country.description:
Country code of the region/country to return offers for.
Valid values: see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_3166-1_alpha-2
Default: `us`.

free_returns.description:
Only return product offers that offer free returns.
Default: `false`.

max_price.description: Only return product offers with price lower than a certain value.

min_price.description: Only return product offers with price greater than a certain value.

function.name: Finish
function.description: If you believe that you have obtained a result that can answer the task, please call this function to provide the final answer. Alternatively, if you recognize that you are unable to proceed with the task in the current state, call this function to restart. Remember: you must ALWAYS call this function at the end of your attempt, and the only part that will be shown to the user is the final answer, so it should contain sufficient information.

final_answer.description: The final answer you want to give the user. You should have this field if "return_type"=="give_answer"

answer_generation.query: I'm planning a trip to Paris with my family and we need some information to make the most of our visit. Can you provide me with news articles about popular tourist attractions in Paris? Additionally, I would like to see relevant images of these attractions to get a better idea of what to expect. Finally, please recommend some good hotels in Paris that are near these attractions.
